overview: Five couples erotically demonstrate 16 sensual sex positions specifically designed to achieve heightened orgasms. Hosted by Adam & Eve's resident clinical sexologist Dr. Kat, this "how to" describes each position and its benefits while encouraging the viewer to explore an adventurous journey toward orgasm at home. Follow the step-by-step instructions as depicted by each couple, who graciously allow us to observe the most intimate act of love.
title: Kama Sutra: Ultimate Orgasm Guide
